name: Platforms (itch) (SergeyFirsov)
description:
It took 3 days and three people to create this game. There were some difficulties with interaction since this is our first project. On the last day we even lost all the assets, so everything is rather scarce in 3D models. But overall I was satisfied, it was interesting experience, my dudes.

Movement:WASD
Attack: LMB
